channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Nikita Lesnichenko
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Nikita Lesnichenko

item.title: Project I: Restaurant in Paris
item.description: Collecting data about Paris, its center, districts using Google geocoding API; Collecting Paris Restaurant Data Using the Foursquare API; Construction and analysis of heatmaps of Paris based on the density of the location of restaurants; Clustering the best points for a restaurant location in Paris using KMeans.
